description:
This Teacher taught Timmy and other young children at a school. She will yell at her pupils if they misbehave.
She booked a Pokémon Trainer and their Pokémon for her pupils to play with on Children`s Day but they could not make the appointment. She asked Ash, Misty and Brock if her pupils could play with their Pokémon instead and they agreed.
name: Reiko
